mapper.select: select coalesce(clm_id, '1') clm_id , coalesce(clm_date, '') clm_date , clm_text , clm_yn , CAST((SELECT cast(count(clm_id) as UNSIGNED)+1 FROM tbl_todo_data where clm_date = #{date}) AS CHAR) AS max_id from tbl_todo_data where clm_date = #{date} order by CAST(clm_id AS UNSIGNED);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_todo_data (clm_id, clm_date, clm_text, clm_yn) values (#{strId} , #{date} , #{title} , #{strCompleted})
UPDATE tbl_todo_data SET clm_text = #{title} where clm_id = #{strId} and clm_date = #{date}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_todo_data SET clm_yn = #{strCompleted} where clm_id = #{strId} and clm_date = #{date}
mapper.delete: DELETE from tbl_todo_data where clm_id = #{strId} and clm_date = #{date}
